column4: im trying to get apache2 running remotely.  i executed command and it says "apache2: Could not determine the server's fully qualified domain name, using 127.0.1.1 for ServerName. httpd already running".  ive already forwarded port 80 on my router, so what else is there?
what were you saying about httpd.conf
i dont know what to edit in apache2.conf.... have you started an apache server before?
you can ask there in english section of forum: http://www.lugthudinie.be
whats webmin? the only thing in apache2.conf that refers to "servername" concerns reports
Webmin is a web interface to administer easyly your computer
why would i install webmin in order to get apache2 running, when i should be able to run apache server without it
if you type localhost in your browser you'll can see your web server in action
if you havent noticed, i wrote that i am trying to do this REMOTELY
im logged onto my ubuntu from windows xp thru putty
im already using ssh.... and im using xchat thru ssh
what is this DQDN file... whats the name of it....
yeah, i tried that but it cant connect
there is one ubuntu machine, one on mac os x, and two xps on that network
then how are you logged on to here?
